text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-13-1/" title="1 Chronicles 13:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 And David consulted with the captains of thousands and hundreds, *and* with every leader.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-2/" title="1 Chronicles 13:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And David said unto all the congregation of Israel, If *it seem* good unto you, and *that it be* of the LORD our God, let us send abroad unto our brethren every where, *that are* left in all the land of Israel, and with them *also* to the priests and Levites *which are* in their cities *and* suburbs, that they may gather themselves unto us:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-3/" title="1 Chronicles 13:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And let us bring again the ark of our God to us: for we enquired not at it in the days of Saul.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-4/" title="1 Chronicles 13:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And all the congregation said that they would do so: for the thing was right in the eyes of all the people.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-5/" title="1 Chronicles 13:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 So David gathered all Israel together, from Shihor of Egypt even unto the entering of Hemath, to bring the ark of God from Kirjathjearim.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-6/" title="1 Chronicles 13:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And David went up, and all Israel, to Baalah, *that is*, to Kirjathjearim, which *belonged* to Judah, to bring up thence the ark of God the LORD, that dwelleth *between* the cherubims, whose name is called *on it*.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-7/" title="1 Chronicles 13:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And they carried the ark of God in a new cart out of the house of Abinadab: and Uzza and Ahio drave the cart.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-8/" title="1 Chronicles 13:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And David and all Israel played before God with all *their* might, and with singing, and with harps, and with psalteries, and with timbrels, and with cymbals, and with trumpets.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-9/" title="1 Chronicles 13:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 And when they came unto the threshingfloor of Chidon, Uzza put forth his hand to hold the ark; for the oxen stumbled.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-10/" title="1 Chronicles 13:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzza, and he smote him, because he put his hand to the ark: and there he died before God.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-11/" title="1 Chronicles 13:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And David was displeased, because the LORD had made a breach upon Uzza: wherefore that place is called Perezuzza to this day.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-12/" title="1 Chronicles 13:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And David was afraid of God that day, saying, How shall I bring the ark of God *home* to me?

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-13/" title="1 Chronicles 13:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 So David brought not the ark *home* to himself to the city of David, but carried it aside into the house of Obededom the Gittite.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-13-14/" title="1 Chronicles 13:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 And the ark of God remained with the family of Obededom in his house three months. And the LORD blessed the house of Obededom, and all that he had.
